Posts.EditableText: Ive got a sound playing on one page, but when i leave the page/room i want the sound to stop, but it doesn't. Ive set the object to switchable but theres no script to turn the sound off
Posts.HTML: Ive got a sound playing on one page, but when i leave the page/room i want the sound to stop, but it doesn't. Ive set the object to switchable but theres no script to turn the sound off

Posts.EditableText: I assume this is a gamebook, which I haven't really used, but in the TA GUI there is an option to 'Stop Sound'.  You can add that to the script that runs when switching the page or the room.
Posts.HTML: I assume this is a gamebook, which I haven't really used, but in the TA GUI there is an option to 'Stop Sound'. You can add that to the script that runs when switching the page or the room.
